definition: united under a central government, unite on a federal basis or band together as a league
details:
adjective
- united under a central government
= synonyms: federated
verb
- unite on a federal basis or band together as a league
= example: unite on a federal basis or band together as a league
= synonyms: federalise, federalize
- enter into a league for a common purpose
= example: enter into a league for a common purpose
= synonyms: federalise, federalize
